author: TAREQUE
text: The cafe has a charming retro vibe that instantly transports you back in time. Their bun maska is definitely a highlight â€“ fresh, buttery, and delicious. However, the tea was a letdown, tasting quite below average. The place tends to get â€¦

author: Shirish Naik
text: Good Luck CafÃ© in Pune is a historic Irani cafÃ© that has been serving food lovers since 1935. Known for its authentic Irani chai and buttery bun maska, it retains its old-world charm and nostalgic appeal. The cafÃ© is also famous for its â€¦

author: Sandeep
text: Cafe goodluck is one of the oldest iconic cafe in Pune that you must visit once you are in the city. Located in ferguson road the cafe can be crowded during weekend. We tried tea and bun maska during our visit in the morning time and it was â€¦

Dropped by the legendary CafÃ© Goodluck near Deccan Gymkhana and yep â€” still got â€¦

author: Sunny Surwade
text: Visited Goodluck Cafe on FC Road for the first time during a casual outing with friends. This place carries a long-standing reputation and is considered one of the historical Irani cafes in Pune. With so much hype around it, we had high â€¦

author: Pratik Sharma
text: This place had been on my list forever after seeing it in tons of vlogs â€” and honestly, itâ€™s totally worth the hype! I came just to try their famous bun maska and Irani chai, and both were awesome. â€¦

author: Avishkar
text: the food was nice, i enjoyed the Bun maska and tea. went to washroom later and the washroom was not well maintained plus they had a gas stove near to the washroom. â€¦

author: Sudeep Datre
text: I have been visiting Cafe Goodluck for many years and enjoyed some really delicious food here. This time I had the mutton kheema which was really good and some nicely made hot chapatis. Loved the kairi panhe too!

author: Aditi Padki
text:
This cafe is a must visit when in pune.

Food : We have been there twice, had Kheema pav, Bun maska, Chai, Nutella bun, â€¦

author: Sanskruti More
text:
Cafe Goodluck, Deccan, Pune.

Highly Recommended: Chai and Bun Maska. â€¦

author: Dr. Aakriti Ranjan
text: A must visit retro aesthetic cafe on FC road. Chai and bun maska, caramel custard are must try. They have a variety to offer from chai bun maska to keema pav and doughnuts.

author: Raveena Gohil
text: Someone had told me that until you visit this place, you have missed out on the true pune experience. So to not miss out on it, came here for a nice Sunday breakfast. And had to order the staple - Bun muska, Chai, Caramel Custard and baked â€¦

author: Vivek Chandel
text:
Famous old name but taste was good great.
You can get better option in your local market.
For first time it's okay to try .

author: Deepshikha Ganguly
text: Iâ€™d heard a lot about the place and was pretty excited to check it out. We ordered the dosa and the omelette keema bun maska; both were good. Is it truly worth all the hype? Maybe.

author: Amit Kulkarni
text: A very famous place in FC road. Easy to spot. Typical iranian menu .. bun maska, omlette n bhurji along with kheema are famous. It's typical taste. U shud definitely try if u like these items ..
